J. CHEM. SOC., CHEM. COMMUN., 1989
Quadrupole Nutation N.M.R. Reveals the Presence of a New Aluminium Species
in Hydrothermally Treated Zeolites
Halimaton Hamdan and Jacek Klinowski
Department of Chemistry, University of Cambridge,
Lensfield Road, Cambridge CB2 lEW, U. K.
27AI Quadrupole nutation n.m.r. reveals the presence of four kinds of aluminium in dealuminated zeolite Y; we
suggest that distorted framework tetrahedral (DFT) aluminium, which is reported for the first time here, is bonded to
h yd roxyl groups formed during dea I u m i n ati o n .
Received, 31st August 1988;
Corn. 8/03495H
